name: Mens Rea
description:
1st try for LD! This game is about hit-man committing crimes on behalf of a client, but trying to avoid a heavy punishment by pretending to commit without intent. Bananas and needles would help.

If you get imprisonment or failed to comply with the client’s request, you fail a game. The goal of this game is to complete the client’s request!

The more you have intent to commit a crime, The worse it is!

[How to play] 

WASD/cursor key: Move 

L key: Stab/Obtain/Put
